title: Admin-aware Internet Identity login redirect + Agrigence footer social links

requirements.summary: After Internet Identity login from /login, route admins to /admin and non-admin authenticated users to /dashboard, with safe error handling on admin-check failures.
acceptanceCriteria: From the /login page, clicking the Internet Identity button completes Internet Identity authentication and then automatically routes an admin identity to /admin.
From the /login page, clicking the Internet Identity button completes Internet Identity authentication and then automatically routes a non-admin identity to /dashboard.
If the admin check fails (network/canister error), the UI shows an English error message and does not incorrectly route the user to /admin.
The existing /admin page continues to enforce access control (non-admins see the access denied screen).

file_operations.description: Replace the current placeholder Internet Identity button behavior with a real Internet Identity login flow using the existing useInternetIdentity hook, then use the existing admin check (useIsCallerAdmin / actor.isCallerAdmin) from the authorization component to decide the post-login redirect (/admin for admins, /dashboard for non-admin authenticated users). Add UI state to (a) prevent double-navigation, and (b) show a clear English error message if the admin check errors, ensuring the user is not routed to /admin on failure. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

acceptanceCriteria: Footer social icons are no longer "#" and each icon navigates to the correct Agrigence social URL listed in this requirement.
Each social link uses target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer".
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Replace the current placeholder ("#") hrefs for Facebook/Instagram/X/YouTube/LinkedIn with the provided Agrigence URLs, and ensure each anchor opens in a new tab with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer".
